title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5319.48 - Extra credits wagered during bonus games
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5319.48 - Extra credits wagered during bonus games

State Regulations

If a bonus or feature game requires extra credits to be
wagered during the bonus and the game accumulates all winnings (from the
trigger and the feature to a temporary win meter, rather than directly to the
credit meter), such game shall: (a) provide a means whereby winnings on the temporary meter can be bet (via the
credit meter) to allow for instances where the player has an insufficient
credit meter balance to complete the feature; (b) transfer all credits on the temporary
meter to the credit meter upon completion of the feature; (c) not exceed the maximum bet limit, if one
is set; and
(d) provide the player
an opportunity not to participate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5319.48

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
